title: Chainsaw Man X Goddess of Victory: Nikke is now live on PC
description: Having recently topped 25 million downloads on Android and iOS, sci-fi RPG shooter Goddess of Victory: Nikke is coming to PC with full cross-platform play. To commemorate the launch, publisher Level Infinite announced a crossover with one of the world's most popular manga properties — the iconic Chainsaw Man.
